mil3.3.9:2.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso rañño adhikāraṁ kareyya, tassa rājā tuṭṭho adhikāraṁ
mil3.3.9:2.2_1: dadeyya, so tena adhikārena pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgibhūto paricareyya,
mil3.3.9:2.2_2: tassa evamassa ‘mayā kho pubbe rañño adhikāro kato, tassa me rājā tuṭṭho adhikāraṁ
mil3.3.9:2.2_3: adāsi, svāhaṁ tatonidānaṁ imaṁ evarūpaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti.
mil3.3.9:3.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kocideva puriso kusalaṁ kammaṁ katvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
mil3.3.9:3.1_1: maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjeyya, so ca tattha dibbehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
mil3.3.9:3.1_2: samappito samaṅgibhūto paricareyya, tassa evamassa ‘svāhaṁ kho pubbe kusalaṁ kammaṁ
mil3.3.9:3.1_3: akāsiṁ, sohaṁ tatonidānaṁ imaṁ evarūpaṁ vedanaṁ vedayāmī’ti.
mil3.3.9:3.2: Evaṁ kho, mahārāja, vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā anubhavanalakkhaṇā cā”ti.
